document.full_text: voters in miami-dade, one of the most populous u.s. counties, removed mayor carlos alvarez from office in a special vote on tuesday triggered by popular anger over a hike in property taxes.
document.title: angry voters oust miami-dade mayor in special vote
lines_and_colors: voters in miami-dade, one of the most populous u.s. counties, removed mayor carlos alvarez from office in a special vote on tuesday triggered by popular anger over a hike in property taxes.
